text: Give the orphans their property and do not exchange the evil for the good and absorb not their property into your property; surely that is a great crime: Whoever has been given charge over others and then acts unjustly toward those under his charge his adversary is his Lord for He ������ avenges His servants what He will not avenge for His own sake. If the protector of the orphan acts with justice and beneficence then his right is protected by God and if he behaves badly and aggressively God is his adversary.
